article_title: Healthcare Reform And Medicare Part D

article_metadata.description: “Faith lost in Obamacare as consumers look to alternatives.” “Why Obamacare co-ops are failing at a rate of 50 percent.” “Obamacare is failing to make care more affordable.” These are just a few of the recent headlines about President Obama’s troubled healthcare law.
